title: Interpretation of a dream about a living visitor to the dead in his home

preview.html: Many may not understand seeing the dead searching for him, and this is what you will find through this article from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing the living visiting the deceased in a dream for an unmarried girl. When an unmarried woman sees that the deceased is offering her food or money during his visit. Good news of her close connection, God willing. God. Visiting a dead person in a dream is also for single women. It is a sign of longing and longing for this person already. Perhaps it is a sign of her negligence in supplication and charity for him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The deceased relative whom the unmarried woman visited in her dream was smiling at her. It indicates her soon marriage if She was engaged. In the case of the previous vision of a girl seeking knowledge, this is a sign of success that will distinguish her, God willing. The vision could be good news for the girl that she will get what she has been hoping to get for a long time. Single parents visiting one of their parents in a dream. An indication of his need for prayers and zakat. If he hears a cry coming out of the grave, and God knows best. In the case of a girl visiting her deceased relative. It symbolizes the actions that she is taking that do not please God Almighty. If he turns his back on her and does not want to meet her, then he must repent and foretell this dream. And if a frown appears on the face of the dead person, it means A warning to him despite the importance of leaving a matter in which God alone knows. See also: Interpretation of dreams about the dead kissing the living. Interpretation of seeing the living visiting the dead in a dream for a married woman. Visiting the dead in a dream for a married woman indicates the good treatment with which she treats others. If the deceased was a parent or father Or the mother and their wife in a dream. This dream symbolizes that this woman feels lonely after her separation. The previous dream for a married woman may be a feeling of longing for one of her parents. Because of her husband’s verbal treatment of her, or perhaps relief comes from God Almighty. Giving something For a dead person in her dream, this dream symbolizes good news that she will become pregnant, God willing. And the dead person who comes to a married woman and gives her something. This dream symbolizes the things that she wants and wants. Visiting the dead person and taking something from her is indispensable. It symbolizes the period in which she will suffer due to lack of money. Especially if the deceased takes gold or food for herself.. God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the event that the deceased appears to her with a frowning face, it indicates that she has abandoned supplication, and she must pray for him, and zakat as well. When the deceased smiles at a married woman in his dream, it shows his satisfaction with her. Visit the deceased in A dream and I saw him inside a large and spacious house. Good news for his good standing with God, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing the living visiting the dead in a dream about the man and its meaning. Seeing the living visiting the dead in a dream is a sign of his good condition and that he seeks to get closer to God Almighty. In the event Visiting a dead man in his house is a sign of the inheritance he will receive from this dead person, God knows best. A dead man visiting a dead man in a dream inside his house is a praiseworthy dream that symbolizes goodness, God willing. Feeding the dead person food is evidence that this person will bless his family. In the event that a man sees The dream is that the dead person is crying. Sign: A

title: Interpretation of a dream about consuming cigarettes in a dream

preview.html: Cigarette is considered one of the wrong habits that people follow, which harms the health of the smoker, and it also harms the health of those around him. Smoking tobacco in the fingertips has unwanted connotations, so a large number of interpretations have appeared from the greatest ancient interpreters, and these interpretations are represented in many places, the most important of which are: The following: When the dreamer sees in a dream that he smokes and is filled with a feeling of joy and happiness, this dream is considered an indication of the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness and the peace in which the dreamer lives. If the dreamer is a smoker in reality, this indicates that he is facing some problems but will be able to solve them. When the dreamer sees himself He smokes in a dream with black smoke coming out of it, this means that he will face some problems in the future. If the dreamer sees cigarettes in a dream that have clean smoke and are free of impurities resulting from these cigarettes...this is a symbol of the dreamer who will achieve many successes. When he sees a non-smoker In fact, he smokes in a dream, this indicates that he is very afraid of something. When the dreamer sees in his dream that others are smoking, this is evidence that his warning is that some problems will arrive, and it is also an indication that the viewer may hear some unpleasant news, and in the event that the viewer He is already a non-smoker and saw some people smoking.. This indicates his annoyance with some people in the coming period. Also do not miss: Interpretation of seeing smoke in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Some other interpretations of cigarette consumption. Commentators have given a large number of other meanings related to their interpretation of a dream about smoking cigarettes, which include the following: In case The dreamer saw himself smoking in a place with a no smoking sign, this means that the dreamer is facing a large number of problems and is losing hope of finding a solution to these problems. It also indicates that the dreamer is moving towards something accompanied by reaching it. Cigarettes in a dream symbolize the dreamer’s need to take a rest and avoid the pressures that surround him. When the dreamer sees that he is sitting with people smoking cigarettes, this indicates arrogance and pride. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sitting with people smoking cigarettes, this indicates arrogance and pride. That he quits smoking, contrary to reality, this means that the dreamer has the ability to get rid of the obstacles that confront him with everything. Persistence and determination. Interpretation of the dream of smoking cigarettes by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained a large number of meanings and evidence related to his interpretation of smoking tobacco in a dream. These indicators consist of the following points: To dream of smoke It indicates gossip and people's mistakes. Senior commentators also pointed out that smoking cigarettes in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period full of social and psychological problems. The dream of smoking also indicates the dreamer's need for a period of rest so that he can get rid of the stress and tension that is plaguing his life. If the dreamer does not smoke in reality and sees smoke in his dream, this indicates his concern for himself and his health. When the dreamer sees people smoking in a dream, this means that these people will try to harm the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is avoiding smoking, this indicates that his desire is strong , and Si

title: Interpretation of seeing a prisoner being released in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing a prisoner leaving prison in a dream: Prison is one of the worst periods a person goes through in his life, not only for himself but also for those around him. Every minute is important to regain his freedom and pass these difficult days, and of course his psychological state changes completely after that. Release and its circumstances change for the better, from prison to dream... good news for the dreamer... or what does it mean? We will find out as we move forward. What is the interpretation of seeing a prisoner leaving prison in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about a prisoner leaving prison has nice connotations if the prisoner is good-looking. The vision indicates that God Almighty will soon save him from the distress he has fallen into in his life, so he will not live in sadness in the coming period. If the prisoner cries while leaving, this is a clear sign of relief and a final solution to the problems, and crying is a relief in reality and in the dream as well. The vision expresses Hearing the good news changes his life for the better, so he should always thank his Lord. The dreamer may already be in prison and if he sees him, this is good news about his innocence or the end of prison soon. Even seeing death in prison does not indicate evil, rather it is an expression of freedom from the trials that He faces it in life. But if he complains of fatigue and sees the dream, this means that he will recover soon and will not feel any harm in his life no matter what happens, because he is close to the Lord of the Worlds and hears his supplications and supplications at all times. If he escapes from it while he is surrounded by dogs that are constantly chasing him, then his vision shows that he is surrounded by bad people who hate him and are trying to harm him in his life. Seeing a prisoner coming out of prison in a dream by Ibn Sirini. Our great Sheikh Ibn Shirin explains that this vision indicates his repentance from the sins he committed in the past, Where he no longer behaves in a different way, but seeks to please his Lord in the coming days. This dream is a clear indication of the happy change that is happening to the dreamer, and he will end all his sorrows in the coming days without any problem. The dream may be an expression of the dreamer’s bad psychological state with his wife, He is uncomfortable with it, so he feels as if he is in a prison that he wants to be freed from, even if he had a dream inside him. Seeing him coming out of it while he is dead is a good sign that he should not be upset by his dream because it is a sign that his end will be great and he will repent for all his mistakes before he dies to meet him. God is fine. Action. The dream indicates that there will be renewals in the dreamer’s life to change his path to what he wants and desires. He also expressed his ability to complete some of the things that took him out of the pain and misery that he suffered for many periods. Whoever sees that he is a prisoner in the house, this is good news for his marriage to A girl will change his life for the better because she has a lot of money. What does it mean for single women to see a prisoner coming out of prison in a dream? Prison in a dream for a single woman is good news for her in all aspects of her life. It is evidence that she achieves everything she aspires to without any harm. It also expresses About her dissatisfaction with her current situation, but she does the impossible to renew her life and move to a higher point in her work and personal life. There is no doubt that everyone loves freedom and spacious places, so seeing...

title: Interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an infant in a dreamIt is the subject of our article today, which we present through an encyclopedia as many people have this vision during their sleep and cannot understand its meaning. Is there good news, as well as the result of seeing children in reality or perhaps in a different state? The meanings of visions vary depending on the psychological and social state of the viewer, and sometimes what the sleeper sees are just meaningless dreams. Dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen give different interpretations of seeing a baby in a dream, which we will explain in detail below, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a baby in a dreamAccording to what the scholar Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned, seeing a baby in a dream, we mention the following connotations: Seeing a baby In a dream, it indicates a friend in the dreamer’s life who holds hatred and enmity towards him, and the dreamer does not realize him. Seeing a group of male children in a dream indicates fears and problems in the dreamer’s life. Buying a male child in a dream symbolizes the wrong decisions that the dreamer will make regarding the affairs of his life. Selling a child in a dream indicates that the dreamer is committing foolishness and blaming those around him. Seeing an ugly male child in a dream indicates financial and psychological crises that the dreamer will face. Finding a handsome male child in a dream indicates the goodness and happiness that the dreamer will have in the next life. Beating the child In a dream, it indicates the differences and material and social problems that the dreamer faces with those around him. Playing with children in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and the fulfillment of dreams by God’s command. A child’s crying in a dream symbolizes the enemies surrounding the dreamer. Seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman says the scholar Ibn Sirin. About seeing an unmarried boy in a dream is as follows: Seeing a baby boy with a beautiful face in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates repentance from a sin accepted by God Almighty. A male baby in one dream symbolizes success, success, and acceptance of prayers. A baby boy crying in a dream indicates pain. And the suffering that an unmarried woman suffers. An infant crawling towards an unmarried woman in a dream indicates a happy and intimate marriage by God’s command. An unmarried woman buying an infant in a dream indicates problems that she will face in her next life. The scholar Ibn Shaheen says that a male child in a dream It indicates marriage or a close connection, while carrying him in her arms indicates a change in her condition for the better. While the scholar Ibn Kathir says that seeing an unmarried child in a dream means worry and sorrow, and seeing him breastfeeding him brings problems and problems during weaning is a happy marriage soon. Seeing an infant in a dream for a woman MarriedThe following are the repercussions of seeing a male child in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a male child in a married woman’s dream indicates the problems she faces in raising her children. A beautiful male child in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the good news that she will rejoice in in the coming days. A married woman hitting a child in The dream symbolizes marital strife and family instability. Seeing a child dying in a dream indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing King Abdullah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing King Abdullah in a dream Jordan is considered one of the Arab countries, and the Arabic language is the official language of its inhabitants. It is located in the middle of the Middle East, and its capital is Amman. The population of the state is about 10 million people. It is a monarchy inherited by sons from their fathers, and the current king is King Abdullah bin Al-Hussein, born in 1962 AD, and he ascended to power in 1999 AD. Interpretation of seeing King Abdullah in a dream? Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream The king is considered one of the highest ranks in the state as he enjoys a high and high position in the state. Seeing this in a dream indicates the status that a person enjoys among the members of his society. Here are the most important interpretations related to this vision: A man's status and position in his society rises when he dreams that he is talking to the king. Likewise, there is strife and wars, and a person lives in distress and hardships, when he sees himself fighting with him in a dream. A young man also gets into trouble with his boss if he sees that he is talking to him while he is angry. A girl also gets a prestigious position in her work when she sees the king in her dream. However, if that ruler is not a foreigner, the person will be exposed to slander and injustice. Moreover, a married woman memorizes the Book of God and becomes an Islamic preacher when she sees herself arguing with him in a dream. Likewise, a pregnant woman gives birth to a child of great importance and status in her society and raises him well. See also: Interpretation of a dream about giving a dead person a white handkerchief in a dream Interpretation of seeing King Abdullah in a single woman's dream This vision shows many meanings for an unmarried girl, as this girl occupies a high position and a high position in the job she works in, and we will tell you the most important interpretations related to this dream: A girl enjoys goodness and abundance in her life when she sees this Vision. Likewise, an unmarried girl marries a prominent figure in society when she sees herself marrying King Abdullah in a dream. She also marries a young man of good will who compensates her for years of waiting, if he sees that she returns to her home and sits with his family. She also succeeds and excels in her studies and obtains a high degree in her education. As well as transforming and changing circumstances for the better, and enjoying psychological comfort after suffering from problems. Moreover, she will get a promotion in her job if she sees herself eating with the king in her dream. Moreover, she will receive many awards and benefits when she sees her kissing his hand in a dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a camera in a dream and its meaning Seeing King Abdullah in a dream about a man A man lives his life in goodness and happiness, when he sees the king in his dream, he is one of the highest ranks in the state, as well as in his hand the government and the management of state affairs, and we will provide you with interpretations related to this vision: A man gains a prestigious position in his job when he sees King Abdullah in a dream. Soon he will travel as well, and his journey will bring him a lot of good and wealth, when he sees that he rules a country other than his own. Similarly, he must give up About the sins he committed and how he approached God through deeds

title: Interpretation of a dream about a person who was released from prison while imprisoned in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a person released from prison while imprisoned in the dream interpretations are most likely carriers of the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of a person released from prison while imprisoned in a dream. It is possible that a dream of someone leaving prison in a dream indicates the end of a problem that the dreamer fell into during the previous period. Seeing someone escaping from prison while imprisoned in a dream may indicate the near relief that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period. In the event that there is a dream that shows someone escaping from prison while he is in prison, this may indicate the end of the financial crises that the dreamer was suffering from in those days. Whoever sees in a dream that an imprisoned person has been released from prison, it may indicate good news for the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about pus coming out of the left breast in a dream. If you dream about pus coming out of the left breast, this might indicate many things. The good that will come to the dreamer in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that pus coming out of his chest in the dream may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer in the coming period. In the event that he sees pus coming out of the chest, this may indicate forbidden money that the dreamer obtains and that He will get rid of it soon. Seeing pus coming out of the left breast in a dream may indicate the soon relief that will happen to the dreamer in those days, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of a dead snake coming out of the anus in a dream A dead snake coming out of the anus in a dream can indicate prosperity that Visions come true during this period. Anyone who dreams of a dead snake coming out of the anus may indicate the friendship that the dreamer enjoyed a lot in those days. The snake coming out of the anus in a dream may indicate the end of a difficult period that the dreamer was going through in those days. Dreaming of a dead snake emerging from the anus in a dream could indicate recovery from diseases and relief of pain that the dreamer was suffering from at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a fetus emerging from the uterus in a dream: In the event that a dead fetus emerges from the uterus in a dream, it may indicate This means being exposed to a difficult problem in those days and a major crisis. A dream about a dead fetus emerging from the womb can indicate difficulties and dangerous situations that the dreamer will go through during these days. In the event that a dead fetus is seen emerging from the mother’s womb, this may indicate a serious weakness that he may suffer from. The dreamer's life during those days. It is possible that seeing a dead fetus emerging from its mother's womb indicates the physical obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off his liver from the mouth in a dream: A piece of his liver coming out of his mouth may indicate... The dream indicates that he is a person who utters a lot of wrong words and needs to stop doing that. In the case of his personal opinion that blood clots come out of his mouth, this may indicate that this person has deceived others and he must repent and return to God Almighty. Seeing a piece of liver Coming out of the mouth can indicate changes occurring in the life of the person

title: Secrets of interpreting eating sweets in a dream for good and evil in different situations

preview.html: What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream? According to what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book Interpretation of Dreams, sweets are good foods made from sugar, with good flavors and smells added to them, and they are made on special occasions and presented to others in celebrations. When he wakes up, he wants to admire this vision and wants to know what is its interpretation and meaning. Interpretation scholars have explained that this vision varies according to the fortuneteller’s marital status, and for this reason we will explain to you through the following encyclopedia what is the interpretation of eating candy in a dream for a single, married girl. And a pregnant woman, follow us. Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing sweets in a dream as a sign of goodness and blessing. If a man dreams that he is buying sweets and eating them, then this dream indicates a feeling of psychological comfort with stability. Eating a lot of sweets in a dream It is a sign of much sustenance and many blessings for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating sweets and enjoying its taste, then this dream shows his fairness and ability to distinguish truth from lies. Eating eastern and western sweets in a dream indicates good happiness and joy for the pioneer. To see yourself Eating large quantities of sweets indicates the approach of the Gulf and the death of sorrows and worries. The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing sweets in a dream symbolizes the arrival of sustenance, goodness and blessings in the life of the dreamer. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating oriental sweets, then this Good news to hear good news that will bring joy to his heart in the very near future. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating a lot of sweets, this is a sign that he will obtain great livelihood in the coming period. If a person, while sleeping, dreams that he is eating sweets, and its taste Very delicious, this vision shows that the fortuneteller is fair and distinguishes lies from the truth. If the dreamer dreams that he is eating sweets greedily, this is a sign that the dreamer will get a lot of money in the coming period. Eating sweets greedily in a dream portends the dreamer the death of worries and sorrows that he suffers Including. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is buying sweets and then eating them, this is a good vision that indicates psychological stability, peace of mind, and peace of mind that the dreamer enjoys. Interpretation of the vision of eating sweets in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. According to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretations, eating sweets in a dream indicates recovery from illness. In the event of an attack of illness in reality, as it indicates the approach of relief and the removal of worries. Contrary to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, Al-Nabulsi interpreted the greedy consumption of sweets as a sign of illness and anxiety. Eating sweets with honey symbolizes marriage if the dreamer is single. And eating sweets containing On dates, it indicates closeness to God and devotion to obeying Him, and God knows best. Imam Nabulsi says that if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating sweets and is actually suffering from worries, then this vision portends the end of the worry that he is suffering from. If

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about black shoes for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black shoes for single women has more than one saying, depending on whether it is new or old shoes. The new shoe may express a new experience in her life, but she finds many problems and hardships in it, and there are many interpretations that she finds through our topic today, as we presented the opinions of great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and... Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about black shoes for a single woman: What is the interpretation of a dream about black shoes for single women? Imam Nabulsi said that the dreamer does not feel very happy in her personal life, and the black color is a sign of her tolerance for the difficulties she finds, whether in her work or in her studies, while the shoe Black in a dream is for single women who are old or dilapidated, which indicates that unpleasant news comes to her and makes her feel very sad and she must try to get rid of her sadness as quickly as possible, continue her life in the right way and try to overcome the pitfalls that she is exposed to. As for Old shoes are not a good sign that the girl is going through a lot of problems that are disturbing her psychological state at this time, and she needs someone to support her psychologically and strengthen her to bear these problems and overcome them safely. Ibn Shaheen said that the black shoes are evidence of the mistakes committed by the unmarried woman in the past. Although she thought that time had passed, she was surprised that the suffering still persisted because of those sins. Interpretation of the dream of the black shoes for the single woman by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin saw that Black shoes indicate the strength of character possessed by an unmarried girl, as she can maintain a distinguished position among all her colleagues at work or study if she is a student, as distinguished. By being firm in judgment and always looking to make radical changes in her life and be capable of good. In the event that she wants to get married and set specific criteria for the boy of her dreams, it is likely that she is interested in choosing the person who has the strongest personality and does not look at his social or financial level at all. Because she is confident in herself. That her presence in his life will bring about a major positive change in his life. The dream interpretation section on the Egyptian website from Google with thousands of interpretations that you are looking for. The most important interpretations of a dream about black shoes for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about buying new black shoes for single women When a girl sees that she is buying new black shoes from a leather store, this means Evidence that she has begun new steps that will determine many features of her future and that bad people will harm her. But if she chooses sports shoes, she cares about her appearance at that time and wants to follow a diet and tries as much as possible to maintain it until she is satisfied with her appearance in addition to her personality. It has also been said that buying shoes means that there is Continuous preparations for marriage to a person with good morals towards whom you feel feelings of love and respect.Interpretation of a dream about wearing black shoes for loved onesIf a girl is wearing black shoes,

title: Interpretation of a dream about a live chicken in a dream about a white and black chicken

preview.html: Live chicken in a dream Catching a chicken Fat white chicken Skinny black chicken The sound of chicken in a dream Chicken droppings in a dream Seeing a live chicken in a dream varies depending on the place and people. If a person sees in his dream that he is selling chickens, this is evidence of his kindness and his soon livelihood. Eating a live chicken is evidence of a change in the dreamer’s condition for the better, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a live chicken in a dream: Anyone who sees a live chicken in a dream is an indication of dealing with matters related to livelihood or nutrition, and hunting chickens in a dream is evidence of your pursuit of a living, and catching A chicken or catching it means that you have a great deal of money and a white fat chicken is a good omen and indicates a generous woman. A skinny black chicken shows a barren woman, and the sound of a chicken in a dream is not worthy of praise. It also shows high expenses and chicken droppings in a dream, neglected children or children, and chicken eggs are money as much as the amount of these. Egg Interpretation of a dream about a chicken in a dream: If a girl sees in a dream that she is eating chicken meat and it is special and beautiful, then this is evidence that she heard good and happy news about this girl. And if a single girl sees in a dream that she is cooking chicken, then this is evidence that her cherished desire will be fulfilled in the near future. Very much, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a chicken in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is raising chickens, this is a sign of kindness and nourishment for that girl. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is selling chickens in the markets, this is evidence of this woman’s future pregnancy. And God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a chicken in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating grilled chicken and it tastes delicious, this is evidence of easy and affordable childbirth, and that she will give birth to a male by God’s command. If a pregnant woman sees that she is buying chicken and raising it, this is evidence of goodness. And sustenance is on the way to her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a chicken in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams of selling chicken and people agree to buy from her, this is evidence that the situation will change for the better, God willing. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is eating chicken with mixture in a large quantity, then this Evidence that the divorced woman has returned to her ex-husband, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about chicken for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is eating chicken from a large store and it tastes delicious and delicious, then this is evidence of success and success for that person who sees it. And if a man sees in a dream that a girl is offering He had cooked chicken with rice and ate it, and found that it had a special and beautiful taste. This is evidence of a relationship or marriage with a beautiful and religious girl, and you will live a stable and quiet life with her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.
